mecard

Class Protocol

  • java.lang.Object
    • mecard.Protocol

  • public class Protocol
extends java.lang.Object
    Responsible for interpreting incoming MeCard requests. Requests are sent as JSON strings. All requests must include the API key or a MetroSecurityException is thrown.

    • Method Detail

      • processInput

        public java.lang.String processInput(java.lang.String cmd)
        Checks incoming commands to the server, parses what the command, its security token and if valid then runs the required activity.
        Parameters:
        cmd - command string request.
        Returns:
        formatted response string.

      • getResponder

        protected Responder getResponder(Request command)
                          throws UnsupportedCommandException,
                                 UnsupportedResponderException,
                                 MalformedCommandException
        Gets the responder based on the argument request.
        Parameters:
        command - the value of command
        Returns:
        Responder appropriate for answering the request as outlined in the environment.properties file.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedCommandException
        UnsupportedResponderException
        MalformedCommandException
        See Also:
        Request
